name: Sticky Notes
description: Multi-tab sticky notes widget with customizable colors, perfect for quick notes and reminders on your canvas

addNote.description: Add a new note { text?: string, color?: string }

updateNote.description: Update note { id: string, text?: string, color?: string }

noteAdded.description: Emitted when note created { id, text, color, timestamp }

noteUpdated.description: Emitted when note modified { id, text, color }

stateChanged.description: Emitted when any state changes for persistence { notes }
